name: Filter Search
overview: Adds search functionality to Jellyfin filter dialogs
description: Adds search functionality to filter dialogs (tags, genres, studios, etc.) and displays enabled/checked filters at the top of the list.

versions.changelog:
For Jellyfin 10.11.x
- Complete rewrite of active filters bar
- Removed unreliable URL parsing and fetch interception
- × and Clear All now use polling (same proven pattern as Select All/None)
- Filter bar populates from dialog interaction, shows hint when filters detected

For Jellyfin 10.10.x
- Complete rewrite of active filters bar
- Removed unreliable URL parsing and fetch interception
- × and Clear All now use polling (same proven pattern as Select All/None)
- Filter bar populates from dialog interaction, shows hint when filters detected
